example_sentence_italian: Il bordo della fossa è scivoloso.
example_sentence_english: The edge of the ditch is slippery.
Water comes out of the ditch.
I put the ladder in the ditch.
There is a board over the ditch.

example_sentence_italian: Il sentiero finisce con la fossa.
example_sentence_english: The path ends with the ditch.

example_sentence_italian: Andiamo alle fosse dietro la casa.
example_sentence_english: We go to the ditches behind the house.
They put boards over the ditches.

example_sentence_italian: Hanno lavorato con le fosse già scavate.
example_sentence_english: They worked with the ditches already dug.
